## Exercise 2. Birthweights

This exercise explores the data set `Birthweight.csv` which contains information on new born babies and their parents. A first examination reveals the following variables:
```{r}
birthweight <- read.csv("data/Birthweight.csv")
head(birthweight)
```
For the first part of the analysis, the column `Birthweight` is selected as a response variable
